name: Spacial Delivery Game
description:
You will be controlling a pedal car and collecting deliveries to be delivered to random locations across the map. As you progress, you can get more and more deliveries at once, eventually running out of space in your trailer.
Player needs to decide when they want to finish the game by retiring. Only by retiring the score will be recorded. Failing deliveries will cost points.

Credits:

Mikko Moilanen: Code, widget logic, environment & level design, post process, 3D modeling, texturing and rigging, particles, sound fx design and recording2

1LMSKi: 3D modeling, texturing, rigging and animation, UI design, logo design, post process, video edit (gameplay footage)

Music: Magabes, used with permission

Terrain shader created prior to the jam.

Audio sounds for pickup and delivery from https://www.gamedevmarket.net/

 Other sounds were recorded during the jam.
